text: (upbeat music)
- [Announcer] When people think of AWS,

they probably think that
increasing storage, hosting sites,
and spinning up instances is easy.

But making it that easy,
well, that's the hard part.

Because behind all the
virtual storage and services

is the actual physical
hardware that powers the cloud.
At AWS, there's a whole team

dedicated to figuring out
which servers to build,
who will build them,

where they should be deployed,
how to configure the racks,

plus the networking, powering,
cooling, and much more.
That team is AWS Supply Chain Automation,
a crew of passionate, talented builders
who love to tackle NP hard problems

and manage the infrastructure
that powers the cloud

while anticipating what
will be needed next.
We do the hard work that makes AWS easy.

Come join our team and
help us build the future.
(upbeat music fades)
